ygData.subject: Introduction of Beserk...
ygData.msgSnippet: The signal was hailed to the council member of the Predacon high ranks. There was a vexed glance from him as Sky Knight made his request to him. Three bots

Subject: Introduction of Beserk...

The signal was hailed to the council member of the Predacon high 
ranks. There was a vexed glance from him as Sky Knight made his 
request to him. Three bots behind him stared back at the monitor at 
his response. Sky Knight himself, if someone was close to him, they 
would see him shaking.

"But sir, Beserk can be a used for more better causes." Sky Knight 
protested. "The bots who built him were rogues. They used him as a 
weapon against our own people to gain power."

"Which failed," the council memeber reminded him.

Sky Knight winced. "Yes. Let us prove to you, sir, that Beserk and be 
set right, if programed properly and trained in better situations."

"I don't see the good in this! Beserk is a clone of Megatron! He was 
used to do nothing but terrorize, kill and and sabotage. He killed a 
whole crew of women, sabotaged two other ships, killed five police 
officers, attempt to kill us, and threatened a bounty hunter's life!"

"I know, sir. I understand the irrisponsiblity that those scientists 
portrayed. But we are licensed scientists. Highly skilled, sir. We 
have constant communications with--"

"Shut up," the council member barked, and dimmed his optics. He 
appeared to be thinking, then his optics brightened back, glaring 
back onto him. "If you can bring that thing back, I want full reports 
everyday. I want to hear about flaws and deaths. If he kills one bot, 
terminate him once and for all." 

Sky Knight froze. "Yes, sir." The monitor went blank. All four 
Predacons slumped their shoulders and sighed in relief in unison. Sky 
Knight turned to his team with a smile. "We did it."

"Do you really think we can bring him back on-line?" the female of 
the team asked. "After all the damage that bounty hunter did to him?"

"I think so," Sky Knight replied. "He is after all clasified as a 
drone."

"And what about his tendacies to kill?" another asked, the largest 
one in the team. "How are we going to break that?"

"Not break it," Sky Knight replied. "Just control it when he's around 
us. We need his skills against the Maximals." He shook his head. "He 
was well built, all I have to say. Fine armor." He shook his head 
again. "He does lack a major function of logic circits. It's our 
goal, Predacons to make his clone/drone into a warrior."

"What's going to be our first job?" the female asked.

Sky Knight nodded to her and turned his back to walk. "Follow me, 
I'll explain it. It's simple really." He grinned.
